Text: If you're searching for spirituality- or maybe found something, but have become a little dazzled and confused along the way -or have any questions about spirituality: "Attaining The Worlds Beyond" is the book that put the puzzle together. At least from my experiance, that cloud of doubt, fanatism, speculations and fantasy vanished and I get a little more enlightened every time I pick it up and read it. Authentic Kabbalah books is the best food your soul will ever have.
